item.description:
Our usual 4th Tuesday meeting date is a problem in November and December because it runs into the Thanksgiving and Christmas / Year end holidays.  As we have done in years past, I am rescheduling the Meetup to December 3rd, as a combined November-December meeting.  This dodges the holidays, and leaves everyone free to attend all the other events and activities that compete for our attention this time of year.

We will be discussing current events at the local and national levels, election results and what happens next in terms of our future party activities.

Many members are much concerned about the apparent takeover of the LP by the neocons, and Barr's many apparently non-libertarian positions.  Come discuss this and share your opinions about what should be done to deal with this question.  What impact will the election results have on this?

In addition, talk about what is happening with local libertarian activities, and share good conversation and fellowship.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess for the "Lowell Area Liberty Association" Important note - please RSVP so that I can tell the restaraunt how many to expect, and get an appropriate size table.
item.name: The Route 495 Area Libertarian November Meetup
